message: I'm considering acquiring an iOS (or Mac) app. If you're a developer with an app you'd like to unload, let's talk.
what are you going to do with it? sell it on the app store?
I don't think anyone would want to sell a 100% finished app
Basically, if you have an app you either can't or don't want to work on or support anymore, you'd sell it to me and then it would be my problem :)
would you want to have a partially developed app
or does it have to be working 100%
Either is fine. I'd be looking to take the app, make it my own and improve on it anyway, so an unfinished app would be fine with me.
Lots of people have finished, selling apps that they just don't have time for anymore, or have lost interest in, or what have you. Daniel Jalkut bought MarsEdit as a complete app, for instance.

Another that I wrote with a friend: http://click.linksynergy.com/fs-bin/stat?id=QJvX5uVmZlo&offerid=146261&type=3&subid=0&tmpid=1826&RD_PARM1=http%253A%252F%252Fitunes.apple.com%252Fus%252Fapp%252FRemovr%252Fid376361480%253Fmt%253D8%2526uo%253D4%2526partnerId%253D30
I wrote this app last spring. I'm starting a iOS consulting company with a friend so I won't have that much free time for side projects
